description: This Kotlin source file defines a Fragment for displaying content details, including artwork, actions, and interaction handlers in an Android TV application. It manages UI elements, loads images asynchronously with Glide, and handles user actions such as play, watchlist, and cast.

classes.name: ContentDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays detailed information about a content item, handling UI setup, actions, and image loading.

classes.name: DetailsDescriptionPresenter
classes.description: A helper class extending AbstractDetailsDescriptionPresenter to bind content item descriptions to the UI.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up presenter selector, adapters, and prepares the UI with the content item.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Loads and sets the backdrop image asynchronously using Glide.

methods.name: wireActions
methods.description: Sets up click listeners for action buttons such as play, watchlist toggle, and cast.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of ContentDetailsFragment with the given ContentItem as argument.
